item.title: 欧洲可转换债券成为关税风暴中的避风港
item.description: 可转换债券是欧洲资本市场近乎沉寂的一角，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动重塑美国贸易政策所引发的动荡之后，它正成为一种避难所。【原文：Convertible bonds — a near-dormant corner of Europe’s capital markets — are emerging as a refuge in the wake of the upheaval sparked by President Donald Trump’s push to remake US trade policy.】

item.title: 扎克伯格在联邦贸易委员会的审判中表现出无休止的妄想症
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Sarah Frier 将探讨美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）对 Meta 的审判事件，以及这些事件对全球最大社交媒体公司的启示。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Sarah Frier looks at the events in the FTC’s trial against Meta and what they may tell us about the globe’s biggest social media company.】

item.title: MAGA支持的人工智能医疗独角兽吸引了一个不可能的联盟
item.description:
Startup Chapter 由 Vivek Ramaswamy 联合创办，此前曾获得 Peter Thiel 和 JD Vance 的支持，该公司刚刚完成了一轮风险投资，估值达 15 亿美元。【原文：

Startup Chapter, co-founded by Vivek Ramaswamy and previously backed by Peter Thiel and JD Vance, just closed a VC round valuing it at $1.5 billion.

】

item.title: 在中美贸易战中，欧洲被视为起着决定性作用
中国进博会捕捉到关税恐慌情绪，争相适应
item.description: 本周在中国广州举行的世界最大贸易博览会上，美国人的身影显得格外单薄。但美国总统的贸易政策是许多谈话的中心。【原文：Americans are thin on the ground this week in Guangzhou, China, at the world’s biggest trade fair. But the US president’s trade policies are at the center of many conversations.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率创 10 月以来最大涨幅，抑制了购房需求
item.description: 由于国债市场波动加剧，导致购房和再融资申请减少，上周美国抵押贷款利率创下 10 月份以来的最大涨幅。【原文：US mortgage rates jumped last week by the most since October on the back of heightened volatility in the Treasury market, causing a pullback in financing applications for home purchases and refinancing.】

item.title: 石油价格跌至 65 美元后，英国石油公司的战略重置面临压力
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）的重大战略调整还不到两个月，但该公司重拾石油业务的基础已经开始出现动摇。【原文：BP Plc’s big strategy reset is less than two months old, but the foundations of the company’s pivot back to oil are already starting to look shaky.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行的 Cau 称欧洲股票评级轻度下调将得到缓冲
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师认为，欧洲股市正在对盈利不佳和经济停滞进行定价，这可能有助于市场渡过报告季的逆境。【原文：European equities are pricing in lackluster earnings and economic stagnation, which could help the market maneuver through reporting-season adversity, according to strategists at Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 特朗普今天将参加日本关于关税和军事支持的会谈
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将出席周三与日本举行的会议，就关税、美国军事支持和 "贸易公平 "进行谈判。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he’ll attend a meeting Wednesday with Japan to negotiate tariffs, American military support and “trade fairness.”】

item.title: 新加坡将与工会和企业合作缓解关税影响
item.description: 本月早些时候，美国对新加坡商品征收 10%的关税，新加坡政府与雇主和工会代表共同宣布计划，以减轻日益加剧的全球贸易争端对经济的影响。【原文：The Singapore government joined representatives of employers and trade unions to announce plans to mitigate the impact of growing global trade disputes on the economy, as the city-state pushes back against a 10% tariff imposed by the US on its goods earlier this month.】

item.title: 欧洲回来了 "的口号为长期亏损的市场注入动力
item.description:
受贸易战影响，美国科技股正在下滑

。【原文：

US tech stocks are slumping on the effects of the trade war

】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税削弱了美国与中国仿人机器人竞争的动力
item.description: 3 月下旬，几家科技公司的代表在华盛顿会见了两党议员，展示了他们最新的仿人机器人。此次活动由众议院中共问题特别委员会组织，旨在展示武力，帮助动员美国在新的技术战场上与中国一决雌雄。【原文：In late March, representatives from several tech firms met with a bipartisan group of lawmakers in Washington to demonstrate their latest humanoid robots. The event, organized by the House Select Committee on the Chinese Communist Party, was intended as a show of force and to help mobilize the US to take on China in a new technological battleground.】

item.title: 特朗普能源老板的公司暴跌 40% 是对美国石油生产的警告
item.description: 能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）说，唐纳德-特朗普政府正在为更多的美国石油生产开 "绿灯"，但他曾经经营的压裂公司发出的信号却闪烁着耀眼的红光。【原文：Energy Secretary Chris Wright says Donald Trump’s administration is giving the “green light” to more US oil production, but the signal from the fracking company he used to run is flashing bright red.】

item.title: 印度推出特朗普品牌豪华住宅新项目
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的房地产公司希望在印度再建一个住宅项目，而在此之前不到一个月，该公司还宣布了在南亚国家建造第一座商业大厦的计划。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s real estate firm is looking to build one more residential project in India, less than a month after announcing plans for its first commercial tower in the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 中国应对波音零部件短缺，科迈科却在囤货
item.description: 在没有美国制造的喷气式飞机和飞机零部件的情况下，中国正在蛰伏以应对贸易战的寒冬。【原文：China is hunkering down for a trade war winter without American-made jets and aircraft parts.】

item.title: 谷歌因在线搜索优势面临英国企业集体诉讼
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司在英国遭遇了一起新的集体诉讼，指控这家美国科技巨头滥用其在在线搜索领域 "近乎完全的支配地位"，向数十万家公司多收数字广告费用。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google has been hit by a fresh class action lawsuit in the UK alleging that the US tech giant abused its “near-total dominance” in online search to overcharge hundreds of thousands of firms for digital ads.】

item.title: 企业内部人士买入股票，发出看涨信号
item.description: 最了解这些公司的人正在向陷入困境的股票多头发出令人鼓舞的信号。【原文：Beleaguered stock bulls are getting an encouraging sign from the people who know the companies best.】

item.title: 美债交易员从鲍威尔处寻求下一步行动的线索
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的评论以及关键数据和债券拍卖，美国国债连续三天的反弹将在周三经受考验。【原文：A three-day rebound in US Treasuries will be tested on Wednesday as investors await commentary from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell as well as key data and a bond auction.】

item.title: 受关税影响，本田将思域的生产从日本转移到美国
item.description: 本田汽车公司计划将混合动力车思域的生产从日本转移到美国，以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口汽车征收关税。【原文：Honda Motor Co. plans to move production of its hybrid Civic from Japan to the US in response to President Donald Trump’s tariffs on imported cars.】

item.title: EQT 的亚洲收购基金获得 100 亿美元资金，有望实现目标
item.description: 瑞典公司 EQT AB 为其最新的泛亚私募股权基金获得了超过 100 亿美元的投资者承诺，使其有望在市场波动的情况下实现筹资目标。【原文：Swedish firm EQT AB received more than $10 billion in investor commitments for its latest pan-Asia private equity fund, putting it on track to reach its fundraising goal despite the market volatility.】

item.title: 裕信银行收购 BPM 面临政府绿灯条件
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利政府为批准联合信贷银行对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购要约，将提出包括限制联合信贷银行俄罗斯业务在内的条件。【原文：The Italian government is set to request conditions including constraints on UniCredit SpA’s Russia business in order to approve its takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市音乐之王的兴衰史
item.description:
Merck Mercuriadis 让从歌星到黑石（Blackstone）的所有人都相信，音乐是下一个热门资产类别。除了他，所有人都成功了。【原文：

Merck Mercuriadis convinced everyone from pop stars to Blackstone that music was the next hot asset class. It worked out for everyone—but him.

】

item.title: 美国基金支持的 ESR 寻求以 20% 的折扣出售中国办公楼
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，华平投资（Warburg Pincus）支持的 ESR 集团有限公司（ESR Group Ltd.）旗下的 ARA 资产管理有限公司（ARA Asset Management Ltd.）将以约 23 亿元人民币（约合 3.14 亿美元）的价格出售上海的一座高档写字楼。【原文：ARA Asset Management Ltd., a unit of Warburg Pincus-backed ESR Group Ltd., is offering to sell a premium office tower in Shanghai for about 2.3 billion yuan ($314 million), people familiar with the matter said, as companies look for a way out of China’s troubled economy and property market crisis.】

item.title: 中国对会谈持开放态度，如果美国表示尊重，并任命联系人
item.description: 据一位熟悉中国政府想法的人士透露，中国希望看到唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府在同意贸易谈判之前采取一系列措施，包括收敛其内阁成员的诋毁性言论，从而表现出更多的尊重。【原文：China wants to see a number of steps from President Donald Trump’s administration before it will agree to trade talks, including showing more respect by reining in disparaging remarks by members of his cabinet, according to a person familiar with the Chinese government’s thinking.】

item.title: 日美贸易谈判有可能进一步加剧日元波动
item.description: 在日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世前往美国启动贸易谈判之际，他面临着被迫讨论货币的风险，这种情况可能会进一步加剧日元的波动。【原文：As Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa heads to the US to kick off trade talks, he faces the risk of being forced to discuss currencies more than he wants, a scenario that may add further volatility to the yen.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 OKX 在与司法部和解后推出美国交易所
item.description: 加密货币交易所 OKX 在同意支付 5 亿美元以解决当地政府提出的指控后仅几周，就开始在美国扩张业务。【原文：Crypto exchange OKX is expanding in the US just weeks after agreeing to pay half a billion dollars to settle charges brought by local authorities.】

item.title: 账户遭黑客攻击后，日本经纪商将加强身份验证
item.description: 日本证券行业组织正敦促经纪商在发生一系列导致未经授权的股票交易的黑客攻击事件后，加强对客户账户身份验证的要求。【原文：Japan’s securities industry group is urging brokerages to tighten identification requirements for client accounts following a spate of hacking incidents that led to unauthorized stock trading.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦可能提出购买更多棉花和大豆以安抚特朗普
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴基斯坦将提议从美国购买更多棉花和大豆，因为巴基斯坦希望将双边贸易顺差减半，并逃避美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收的关税。【原文：Pakistan will offer to buy more cotton and soybean from the US, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as it looks to halve its bilateral trade surplus and escape tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 沙特企业不受市场波动影响，继续推进首次公开募股计划
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策助长了全球市场的波动，但这一迹象表明，迄今为止，沙特王国的交易渠道仍在继续。【原文：Saudi Arabia is set to see a slew of companies test investor appetite for initial public offerings over the coming weeks, a sign that the kingdom’s deal pipeline is holding up so far despite the global market volatility fueled by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 意大利在 S&P 评级上调后测试投资者对债券的需求
item.description: 自上周 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）提升其信用评级以来，意大利共和国首次进入银团债券市场，以寻求利用投资者情绪的改善和更加稳定的市场背景。【原文：The Republic of Italy is coming to the syndicated bond market for the first time since S&P Global Ratings lifted its credit rating last week as it seeks to capitalize on improved investor sentiment and a more stable market backdrop.】
